Mathias Grassow.title: 001 Mathias Grassow - The gardens of imagination - The early years 1980-1983
Mathias Grassow.about:
This new and carefully compiled series begins with two compilations from the early days and the beginning of M.Grassow's career. If there is enough interest, we will be happy to continue using this portal for more fine releases from our archive.......at irregular intervals.
So here is number one from "The early years" - 1980 -
After 40 years of musical travel, this is the real beginning from the beginning .....
Enjoy !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released July 5, 2020
Many thanks to my Russian friends and especially to LEV LEVIN for all their efforts to select and provide the most representative pieces from the times. AGUILAR only has the rights to offer and distribute this music here.
Special thanks to CORNELIA KERN for page design, images and words and all her work through the times :-)

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) Ambient-Chi-Night
Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR
Mathias Grassow.about:
The "Ambient Chi Night" is a 4-hour extravaganza and was an event and experiment of the artist in collaboration with his wife Cornelia Kern and the wisdom teacher OM. C.Parkin. The 4-hour journey was accompanied by energetic work, breathing and drumming, which unfortunately cannot be heard here for technical reasons.
This unique document reflects the energy of that night, if only as a shadow of what happened "live" and came across as pure power.
These recordings were made directly by the hall mixer and neither compressed nor otherwise elaborately reworked - entirely in accordance with the artist's philosophy of maintaining the highest possible authenticity.
This live-event contains source tracks/fragments from the following albums :
Silent abundance III
The incomprehensible emptiness
Spirals of roses in time
The forgotten wisdom of the forbidden word
Umlaufbahnen
Lichtwerk
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 1, 2021
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for participation in this project, support, cover image and layout.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) The forgotten word of wisdom
Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album is the successor to the mystical "The Forgotten Wisdom of the Forbidden Word" and continues the allusions to the "values" brought up by the church and state over thousands of years. Musical alchemy lives on here ......
from the west ..... to the east .....
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 5, 2021
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for participation, cover image and layout.
Celebrated on different synths, frame-& ritual drums, voxes and more.....

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) Trans-Orient-Express
Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR
Mathias Grassow.about: An eurasian and mystical journey. A train ride in the style of the Orient-Express..... but imaginary maybe from Spain to Persia, or from whereever. you may start..... Impressions from the train window........ Emotions, memories of heydays, of becoming and passing away, of universal and own truths and lies, of progress and regression, - of senseless loops and finally coming home..... or the return ? .......... Impressions from the train window....... Emotions, memories.........repeat...... Transmission ends......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released June 18, 2021
Totally played LIVE in one take at home between 5th and 7th april 2021. No overdubbing !
The last three "hidden" pieces represent alternative ends of the journey.
A small wink....... as return from the journey every listener can consider his personal preferred "station".
Played in respect and deep gratitude on several synths and samplers, several ritual-shaman-frame drums & over/undertone singing.
Mastered by Thomas Sauer alias SONIC☉SPACES  (pen-umbra.bandcamp.com)  - many thanks !
Thanks for my second life gift and to all who accompanied me......
Love you CoKe ;-)

Mathias Grassow.title: STEP IX - The early years (1992-1994) - "Pictures from the other side" - Full session"
Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR
Mathias Grassow.about: The complete "Pictures from the other side" session was done sometime between 1992 and 1994. I mixed basic tracks by Klaus and Ted (outtakes) into one big work. It was never published ...... I can't remember what the reason was. Typically "forgotten pieces".
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 22, 2020
Thanks to Lev Levin for archive restauration and enthusiam to catalog everything.....

Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR

Mathias Grassow.title: STEP X - The early years (1986) - "Healing chants"
Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR
Mathias Grassow.about: These pieces were created in a minimalist phase. Very reduced sounds - the temporary return to the single note, to the drone. Voice and organ sounds dominate here. Nice document. The influence of Peter-Michel Hamel cannot be ignored.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 20, 2020
Thanks to Lev Levin for archive restauration and enthusiam to catalog everything.....
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for images, concept and layout of these series.

Mathias Grassow.title: STEP XIV - The early years (1986-1989) - "Allegorical doors to inner worlds"
Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR
Mathias Grassow.about: Another beautiful memory of the good old 80s. The pieces moved away from the "New Age" to the more individual "natural mysticism", Christian mysticism and Sufism. Good choice by LEV LEVIN , many thanks !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released April 5, 2021
Thanks also to Lev Levin, who lovingly selects and restores the pieces of all archives. Thanks to Cornelia Kern for the step pictures and the layout.

Mathias Grassow.title: STEP XV - The early years (1984 - 1987) - "Mystic travel"
Mathias Grassow.artist: Mathias Grassow feat. Cornelia Kern - AGUILAR
Mathias Grassow.about: On these really old recordings one notices the rather limited equipment and the partly "naive" implementation of the longing for the Far East and Buddhism. All in all a fine document of the times thanks to Lev Levin.....
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released April 5, 2021
Thanks to Lev Levin for archive restauration and selection of the tracks.
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for "step-images" , layout and support.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1988) Behind The Evident Void
Mathias Grassow.about:
«Behind The Evident Void» was released in 1988 on the 90-minute audiocassette.
In 2002 the shortened version (4 tracks) was released on CD-R. For the first time this early work is available now in its full 5-tracks form as lossless digital downloads.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 30, 2014
Composed, played, mixed and recorded by Mathias Grassow 1987/88.
Instruments: keyboards, synthesizers, singing bowls, overtone flute & mixing effects.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1988) Pipes of peace
Mathias Grassow.about:
Another AQUAMARIN release from the golden New-Age phase of the artist. Nevertheless this recording is very special up to the present through the fascination of the church-pipe-organ, which were EMULATOR II samples, played on ENSONIQ Mirage.
From the source, this one here is a "Part II" album from an earlier, yet unreleased "Part I".
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released July 14, 2019
Thanks to my friend PETER-MICHAEL HAMEL who has inspired me with his timeless album ORGANUM from 1985 !

Mathias Grassow.title: (1989) On silent wings of healing 1
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album was the top of the artists New-Age era.
After the second part he radically stopped this style.
Later works turned completely off New-Age and from the early 90s ambient became in the broadest sense a very own style of Mathias Grassow.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released July 14, 2019
Dedicated to Mr. Braune who did'nt trust in this style from the artist :-)

Mathias Grassow.title: (1991) Prophecy
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1991.
PROPHECY is a story from the spiritual path, represented in hte myths of King Arthur.
…Schließlich sprach König Artus: "bei Gott, edle Gefährten und Herren, wir haben heute Wunder gesehen, doch ich glaube, bevor es nacht wird, werden wir noch größere Wunder erleben".
Dann wandte sich König Artus an Galahad und sagte: "Herr, ihr seid willkommen, denn Ihr werdet viele gute Ritter zu der Suche nach dem heiligen Gral bewegen und Ihr werdet vollbringen, was nie ein Ritter zu ende führen konnte……"
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 16, 2016
All songs composed, played, mixed, recorded and arranged by Mathias Grassow on some keyboards and synthesizers between May 1990 and July 1991.
Very special thanks to Klaus Wiese, without his help this work hasn't been realized.
Lovely thanks to Ted de Jong, David Hykes, Alain Presencer, Steve Roach and the beautiful landscapes of Scotland and Ireland for inspiration and mental support.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1992) Psychic Dome
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1992
Psychic Dome - meaning:
Mathias Grassow again pursues one concept - he is setting parts of the psychic words to music, in the accordance with the philosophies of the Cypriot Daskalos, who this work is also dedicated to.
The subtle entitling of the single pieces stands for different states of mind. Like a helix ("Dome"), the compositions continously penetrate into deeper layers of awareness, to find its climax in a representation of the possible state after death ("Through The Infinite Halls Of Bardo Thödol"). According to the Tibetian Book of Death, this is the state of the "liberation of the soul by hearing". There are analogies of the importance of "Listening" in other religions, too.
The two last parts, "At The Edge - Parts I & II", represent the noetic worlds, in which time and space have virtually dissoved (5th dimension). In oder to meet the demands of "Psychic Dome", it should be listened to in a state of calm and taking one's time. It is not advisable to share one's attention out on anything else while listening.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 16, 2016
Keyboard, synthesizer, sampler and several sounds & alienation effects are played by Mathias Grassow.
All songs composed, played, mixed, recorded and arranged by Mathias Grassow between 1990 and 1992, except track 3 (by Mathias Grassow and Jorge Reyes, © KoHa Music, Mundo Music & Freibank) and track 4 (by Jorge Reyes, © Mundo Music & Energie Musikverlag)
In the first place I want to give my sincere thanks to Klaus Wiese, who has been my friend and example, and whose musical and technical advice I appreciate very much. He actually is the spiritual father of many of my compositions. Furthermore my thanks to Peter-Michael Hamel, composer, who has inspired me through his way of being and through his music.
I also wish to thank Jorge Reyes, Steve Roach, Elmar Schulte (SOLITAIRE), Rüdiger Gleisberg, Winfrid Trenkler, Klaus Kaiser, Matias Gonzales, Curbelo and all the other friends in Spain, Arndt Maschinski, and, of course, Frank & Almut Schenker.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1993) In Search Of Sanity
Mathias Grassow.about:
IN SEARCH OF SANITY is dedicated to the spirit of the Slieve League cliffs and the famine village of Port in County Donegal/ireland. As these compositions are also tales about searching sanity by the way of lonelyness and hermitage I made the work in silent honour of the monks of Skellog Michael.
All sounds are composed, played, arranged and recorded by Mathias Grassow between 1992 and 1993, except "Conjuration" and "Troubles", wich are composed and played by mathias Grassow and Aman.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released March 27, 2017
Mathias Grassow: all electronic equipment, flutes, voices, percussion and effects, programming.
Aman; digeridoo on tracks 2 and 3.
Many thanks to Klause Wiese and Ted de Jong for some basicrecordings on track 1.
Note: The sound of this work is different from normal productions: you hear deep basses and earthen drums, combined with filigree trebles and noises (e.g. crickets) in the background, this, and many other sounds, are intended so. Its importent, to hear the music no too loud!
"In search of sanity" was recorded by courtesy of KOHA-music, Munich, Germany.
Cover design: JUAN CARLOS SASTRE.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1994) Lifecycle
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1994.
LIFECYCLE is an idea of cosmic laws of life, wrapped in mostly rhythmic music. Compared with PSYCHIC DOME, where the depths of the human psyche are represented and discovered, Lifecycle follows the path of the outer. This is the attempt to present the pulse of life with all its ups and downs. This way the composition feels compact, earthly and in the end well understandable in everyday life. Lifecycle is no concept album designed to interprete life from birth to death, but really the artist's understanding of tasks and situations for learning in everyday life and the upcoming feelings...
The music of Lifecycle is recorded live without expensive multitrack technique. No track has been "straightend' afterwards or worked over costly. I have a special attention on livehood and energy in music. The moods of the spontaneous creativity shall be kept at all costs; in traditional indian music for instance this goes without saying...
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 10, 2016
Keyboards, synthesizer, percussion and voices are used on Lifecycle. The use of any computer hard and software was consciously avoided by the composer. Lifecycle was composed, played, recorded, mixed and arranged by Mathias Grassow in 1992/93.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1995) Ambience
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1995.
A slowly evolving soundscape from the european master of electronic ambient music: drones, waves and deep sounds from the underworld for an epic adventure in the spiral depths of the conscience.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 20, 2016
Composed and performed by Mathias Grassow between 1992 and 1994.
A real live recording with no overdubs. Klaus Wiese plays tibetan singing bowls on tracks 1, 3 and 5. Thanks for bow-chime sample-food on track 6.
"Ambience" is an inner document of my 'self'.
I wish to dedicate it to all the lovers and supporters of my music. Thanks...
Produced by Gianluigi Gasparetti for Totem Records, a label entirely devoted to meditation soundscapes, tribal-ritual music and dark electronics.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1998) Mind Riders
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1998.
Soundscapes with rhythms.
Again these are four pieces, "forgotten" for a long time, chosen because of none has lost its spirit since the years.
Tracks 1 and 4 are deep emotional reflections of fascinating Northern landscapes. Tracks 2 and 3 are much longer on original recording and without rhythm. These two pieces are description of mankind's spiritual-body, inspired by philosophics of the Cypriot Daskalos.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1998) The Fountain Of Remembrance
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1998.
The Fountain Of Remembrance is truly channeled unpersonal music from a higher consciousness, denominationless, intentionless... not even beautiful, but truthful. Today, it's the spiritual essence of my music, a western musical way of the old indian "Nadh-Yoga".
Special thanks to Martina Leisnikow for inspiration and "spirit". Dedicated to my falcon, "the warrior of the heart" : griseldis Sokoll and to our son merlyn Gabriel.
Mathias Grassow, February 1998
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 27, 2015
Parts I - VII composed and performed 1996 by Mathias Grassow.
Parts VIII - IX composed and performed 1998 by Mathias Grassow.
Mixdown direct to CD-R with 44,1 Khz; February 1998 by Mathias Grassow.
Instruments: keyboards, sampler, singing-bowls, voice, nature sounds.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1999) Dissolution
Mathias Grassow.about:
These recordings are a hommage to dark and melancholic moods, a credit to the rising of pagan instincts of self-considering by doubts on public regulations. Dedicated to lovers of cemetarys, old castles, the mystic side of the middle-age and to the fullmoon nebular nights.
Thanks to Simon Marsden for inspiration, thanks to the British Isles for given moods…
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released January 30, 2015
Composed and performed by Mathias Grassow between 1989 and 1998.
Mathias Grassow: electronics, samples, voice, bowls, electric guitar, soundeffects.
Members of NONO-ORCHESTRA: bowed metal-instruments.
Aman: didgerido.
You can buy physical CD from official Databloem store here:  databloem.com/home/86-mathias-grassow-dissolution.html

Mathias Grassow.title: (1999) Eclipse
Mathias Grassow.about:

This overworked version is not 1:1 with the unfortunately damaged original double-CD-R from the late nineties !
Update : Special thanks to Lev Levin for restoring the original recording in march 2020, which is available here and now for the first time.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released July 31, 2019
The original files are unfortunately damaged.
We tried to save what was going to save. Partly the pieces were shortened, replaced or dropped.. Since the quality itself is not the best, this album is offered for a special price!
Many thanks to Hellmuth Schomberg for rescue assistance and for provision of the files.
Cover artwork by Joachim Burrer.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1999) Space
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1999.
2 CD - long surrealistic soundscapes, like the pictures of Dali.
Space is an avangarde work, not music in an «easy-listening» way. It's a description of the unknown spaces in inner and outer rooms, reflecting the endlessness and its inconceivability.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released January 13, 2015
Composed and performed by Mathias Grassow 1999.
Mixed, recorded and refreshed @ AKROASIS studio in June 1999.
Keyboard-dronning-sounds by Mathias Grassow. Contains also sounds of bowed-metal-instuments, windharps, bowls and samples of voices, flutes and speech.
Cover artwork by JOACHIM BURRER.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1999) Sphere
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1999.
2 CD - long surrealistic soundscapes, like the pictures of Dali.
Sphere is the logical follower of my earlier work 'Space'.
The 3 pieces can be understood as a sound or a mood, and, of course, as MUSIC.
I prefer the characteristic 'state of being'. Anyway, somethimes it feels dark and strange to listen, sometimes it can be a holy and blissgul experience.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 31, 2015

Celebrated on different acoustic and electric instruments.

Mathias Grassow.title: (1999) The Concerts...
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1999.
«The Concerts»:
CD 1 (tracks 1-2) recorded in Spain in San Sebastian, March 1993.
Guests = MU-A orchestra (Klaus Wiese & Mark Leistikow).
CD 2 (tracks 3-5) recorded in Germany in Frankfurt, March 1996.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released February 9, 2015
All songs composed and performed by Mathias Grassow between 1991 and 1995.
Mixdown by Mathias Grassow in April 1999 @ AKROASIS studio, Wiesbaden.
No overdubs! Only the pure sound of the concerts is heared, except a litle denoising and some other refreshments in normal way by copying digital.
Instruments: keys, synths, electronics, nature-sounds, voice, singing-bowls, overtone-flute.
Many thanks to Cruz Gorostegni, making the Spain concert possible.
Many thanks to Rolf Haybach, making the German concert possible.
Cover artwork by Joachim Burrer.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2000) Sky
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 2000.
2 CD - Long surrealistic soundscapes, like the pictures of DALI (very quiet and floating).
This third release of mind music was not planned so far, but the incredible sounds of Klaus Wiese/NONO's bowed metal instruments gave me enough inspiration to record this surrealistic soundscapes once more on CD-R.
For me, this is a real kind of modern 'mood' music, of a famous new style of classical music.....
Celebrated on different acoustic and electric instruments.
Thanks to all who feel the charge....
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 26, 2016
Composed and performed in 2000 by Mathias Grassow.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2000) The Fragrance Of Eternal Roses
Mathias Grassow.about:
"Fragrance of eternal roses' - the title is connected to sweet new-age music, but also to the importance of fragrances in oriental culture....and....like a flower grows slowly, the music develops from ground to the heart and mind. This album mainly was played with analogue synths - warm, bright, shiny....with a smooth but strong focus inside....
2nd re-release planned for 2019 !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2000-?) The Qumra I & II mixes
Mathias Grassow.about:
These mixtures, which were made together with Klaus Wiese around the year 2000 in Munich, contain many elements of the two QUMRA cassettes. Upgraded by single new tracks, originally 5 pieces were created that were never released and originally intended to be released as a follow-up album to MERCURIUS.
Unfortunately the 5th one is irrecoverably lost. That is one of several reasons, that these sessions should not be withheld any longer.
The recordings were neither edited nor smoothed out in order not to falsify the original spirit as much as possible. That was Klaus's way of working.....
and I am learning and teaching these further.....
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 24, 2018
Initially limited offer until the end of 2018.
Cover painting and collage by CORNELIA KERN, many thanks !

Mathias Grassow.title: (~2000) The SEVEN SEAS  - Sound installation live in munich
Mathias Grassow.about:
Here comes a new old jewel from the archives :
This unique document, a LIVE recording from a studio in Munich, was created around the year 2000 and shows both artists on the extraordinary instruments UP-RIGHT, BOW-CHIME and GLASS-HARP. on tracks 1-7.
The elemental force has lost none of its power! 100% live improvisations without any keys, synths, other electronics or effects.....thus, the 20-year-old original tracks offer the highest possible authenticity!
For your attention :
This work (tracks 1-7) will be released in a strictly limited edition BOX together with EL-HADRA and HOLY DOMAIN on the Russian label GS-productions in the next few months. News and release date will be announced soon.
The 2nd total live added "remixes" Part (tracks 8-23) from 2019 play around and complement these original sounds with electronic equipment & deep voice by MG.
Enjoy this unique force and immerse yourself in this elemental power and, as it were, one of the last sound legacies of Klaus Wiese.......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released March 9, 2019
Images, graphics and layout by CORNELIA KERN. Many thanks !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2003) Expanding Horizon
Mathias Grassow.about:
EXPANDING HORIZONS
To dive in the oceans of wisdom
With all kinds of lunatics beside
Don't see the difference between
Right & Wrong...
....and nothing is know
To fly into the spheres of knowledge
Including also all mistakes and confusions
Don't recognize what's real or what's dream...
....and nothing IS KNOWN
To glide into the spaces of GODS & DIVINE
And also the DARKNESS is near
But what's now black and what's now white?
....AND NOTHING IS KNOWN
And after all
To see with breaking eyes
EXPANDING HORIZONS
And in this final moment, suddenly,
EVERYTHING iIS KNOWN...
~Carsten Agthe, Summer 2002
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 3, 2016
Mathias Grassow: keyboards, synthesizers, samples, drum loops, violin & guitar-cither,tambura-cither (self-build instrument), voices, noises, somenature sounds, effects.
Alio Die: textures & drones, nature-soundfield-recordings, different percussion-loops.
Basic track recordings made by Alio Die 1999 in Italy, overdubs by Mathias Grassow 2001 at AKROASIS STUDIO, Wiesbaden, Germany.
Concept-drawings, recordings, arrangements and mixdown by Mathias Grassow in 2001.
Mastered by Scott Hull at Visceral Sound. Design by Orion Landau.
Guests & Special Thanks to:
Klaus Wiese: different Indian string-instruments, cither, bowls, voice.
Carsten Agthe: percussion.

Idea and concept of Anam Cara by Mathias Grassow. This album was released as CD-R in a strictly limuted edition. Totally played live by MATHIAS GRASSOW, CARSTEN AGTHE and ROBERT KATH between 2001 and 2004.
The ANAM CARA solo-works, more in ASHRA & GOETTSCHING style were recorded earlier and are not to be seen in musical context here with this work.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2005) The House On The Borderland
Mathias Grassow.about:
From the book of William Hope Hodgson ( 1877 - 1918)
English author, photographer, sailor and body builder, Hodgson produced all of his writhing in the space of eleven years before he was killed in World War I.
Lovecraft called him "second only to Blackwood in his serious treatment of unreality".
The House On the Borderland, from the manuscript discovered in 1877 by Messrs. Jonnison and Barreggnog, in the Ruins that lie to the South of the Village of Kraighten, in the West of ireland.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 26, 2016
Recorded and mixed at Caltiki in 2004
Custom sample source by Vienna Symphonic Library, Spectrasonics and Atmosphere.
All songs composed, performed 7 produced by NOSTALGIA in 2003/2004.
Concept drawing by Luigi Seviroli.
Artwork by taniABMauro.
NOSTALGIA wishes to thank all supporters, magazines and friends during the last years.
Mathias Grassow says hello to Carsten Agthe, 'Secrets of The Moon' & Phil, Thor Wanzek and Tito Kölling.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2007) Live in PRAG & MÜNSTER
Mathias Grassow.about:
Recorded live during two performances in PRAG (czech republic) & MÜNSTER (germany) in 2007.
Prag recorded at Palac Akropolis in frame of concert series MUSIC INFINITY with JIRI MAZANEK as support gig
Münster recorded in Club Cuba, organized by Till Kniola.
Just found both recordings hidden on HDD while sifting through my concert collection.....Now it's time to make these recordings available to the audience.
Specially the prague gig was a powerful and extraordinary performance.
Both recordings were recorded directly at the hall mixing desk and were not further edited.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released January 21, 2019
Thanks to the whole prague team, specially Kristian and Josef.
Thanks to Till for organizing Münster.
Thanks to Björn Barth who reminded me of the club.
Cover painting by CORNELIA KERN.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2009) Heart of the earth Parts 1-9
Mathias Grassow.about:
Older recordings from 2009 in its original 'live at home' version. No overworking , no overdubs.......made through several nights in 2009 . These recordings marked a new era in the artists career, ending in 2013....
ATTENTION : 15 hours music for permanent special price, as some pieces have errors !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released April 22, 2018
All titles are 'working-titles' and have no special concept meaning here.
I also can not promise that parts from this work were also used for other publications. Nevertheless, I do not want to withhold these pieces any longer. I decided to leave all the pieces as they are - with all mistakes that make the live recordings alive .......
Artist photo taken by CORNELIA KERN 2018.

Mathias Grassow.title: (~2010 & 2025) Violin Phase II - Sources
Mathias Grassow.about:
The ‘Violin Phase II’ contains the original files of the live improvisation from the ‘Violin Phase’ sessions long time ago. This homage to STEVE REICH and minimal music in general is drone music with a lot of movement; the listener is in the centre of the cyclone or is the hub of the wheel to which all spokes converge. All the noises and imperfections in this recording are intentional and are intended to lend additional power and depth to the overall impression.
The return to the single tone, to a complete standstill, where everything comes to a standstill (mind) and true freedom in ‘non-thinking’ moves out of ‘samsara’ (the world of delusion) towards the idea of “samadhi” (higher state of consciousness) and ‘nirvana’ (end of all factors associated with false personal ideas of existence), is a possible concept of minimal music. Here is our musical approach.....
Because this is an older live recording please excuse some rare clicks in this authentic document !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released February 14, 2025
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for Cover image and layout.
As this is a work that is around 15 years old, we are offering it at a special price.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2011) Sky
Mathias Grassow.about:
Composed & performed by Mathias Grassow in 2000/2010
Remastered by A.P. in May 2011
Mixed & designed by mr_rehn
Photography by mr_rehn
Buy CD -->  gterma001to010.blogspot.ru/p/gterma002-mathias-grassow-sky.html
If you want an autographed copy please contact Mathias Grassow here -->  www.mathias-grassow.de
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 17, 2011
"Home to man's pantheons of gods and various immortal beings, a giant sphere on which sit attached the brightest lights of the night sky, sparkling next to ominous towering clouds of majestic low pressure systems. The scattered threads of reddish clouds quickly race across the evening glare as day fades to night. The sky retains its grip on man's imagination, challenging our boundaries as the great beyond is beckoning in the distance.
The longtime gterma favourite "Sky" was originally released by Mathias as a double album in the year 2000 available through the then Klaus Wiese website. The Sky sessions are longform drones with an enormously uplifting character. For the new edition we condensed the best moments of the original release into a single mix and combined it with more recent drones produced in 2010 and everything was then remastered." - GTERMA press release

Mathias Grassow.title: (2012-2019) The secrets of Chartres
Mathias Grassow.about:
The Cathedral of Chartres is a small wonder and certainly one of the most remarkable churches in the world. In addition to all kinds of inexplicable things, we also find such special features as the labyrinth embedded in the ground.
Anyone who is able to get involved in the miracle of this church will be filled with the idea that grandeur and silence can go hand in hand with joy.
The tracks are composed between 2012, with additions in 2019 - The complete mix and refreshing was done in may 2019.
Based on ancient shamanic ceremonies and free live improvisation.
A very gentle hand made the archaic sound audible without destroying it by sterility. The roughness and the impetuous analogue sound is exactly wanted so !
Special price for almost four hours ambient in the usual depth.......
ATTENTION ! Please visit :  soundcloud.com/mathias-grassow  for sound samples in wav quality !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 9, 2019
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for cover layout & support !
Dedicated to NOTRE DAME de Paris.
This album can be heard in direct connection with my "Harmonia mundi" :
mathiasgrassow.bandcamp.com/album/2014-harmonia-mundi
"As a part of the harmonia mundi journey, the 'Chartres' album once more explores the deep mystery of mystical space.The powerful effect of the cathedral is in the LIGHT, which fills the space of the cathedral like a rhythmic fluid, comparable to the dark-red-violet light of gothic domes....This evokes the cleansing of our hearts within their worlds of truth, wisdom and love."
In depth,
Mathias Grassow

trackinfo.title: Labyrinth of joy in silence
trackinfo.about: Not delivered and barricaded, it is more than meditation in its perfected beauty ..... it is the mischief in joy, dancing and singing .........
trackinfo.credits: from (2012-2019) The secrets of Chartres, released May 9, 2019

Mathias Grassow.title: (2012) Alchemystery
Mathias Grassow.about:
Conposed and performed by Mathias Grassow in 2010
Mastered by A.P. in November 2011
Design and photography by mr_rehn
Buy CD -->  gterma001to010.blogspot.se/p/gterma010-mathias-grassow-alchemystery.html
If you want an autographed copy please contact Mathias Grassow here -->  www.mathias-grassow.de
"Recent scientific theory and particle experiments are now challenging long accepted truths about our perception of the very world we inhabit. As mankind gazes further into space and our past the questions become more urgent and challenging. What is our origin and what is the nature of the universe, the very fabric holding life, matter and time together? Among academic disciplines and dogmatic faiths, our tertöns are striving to find the lost treasures, and among them Mathias has chosen the path of music as an insight into our cosmos. The Aural Alchemy sessions are dedicated to this very purpose.
Tracklist
Part I : Adrift on a Strange Wind
1.1 - Veiled Auranauts (16:48)
1.2 - Obscured by a Falling Light (42:21)
Part II : Inside the Inner
2.1 - In a Temple of Longing (43:28)
2.2 - A Ring of Standing Stones (25:30)
Alchemystery is the first title in a suite dedicated to musical divinations seeking knowledge about the mystery of our origin and what binds our world together. Mathias explores music and its vibrations, both external and internal, as he treads an improvised path into the colourful and enigmatic realms of aural arcanum." - GTERMA press release
Mathias Grassow.credits: released February 1, 2012

Mathias Grassow.title: (2012) Beyond The Silence - Live At Gut Saunstorf
Mathias Grassow.about:
Buy CD -->  gterma021to040.blogspot.se/p/gterma023-mathias-grassow-beyond-silence.html
If you want an autographed copy please contact Mathias Grassow here -->  www.mathias-grassow.de
Performed at the Gut Saunstorf, Northern Germany, on August 4, 2012.
Performers – Carsten Agthe & Mathias Grassow.
Mastered By A.P. in October 2012.
Edited By, Design, Photography By – mr_rehn.
Recorded By [Live] – Frank Malek.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released February 1, 2012
"This summer, Mathias and Carsten performed live at the Gut Saunstorf, an early 20th century mansion now renovated and turned into a retreat in Northern Germany. The concert marked the end of an extended period of silence for the people attending, who were mainly guests from the retreat. For many, this was their first introduction into drone music.
Tracklist
Part I: The Woodland Hideaway
1. Daybreak (12:39)
2. Drinking From A Clear Stream (17:21)
3. Seeking Sanctuary (15:49)
4. The Hunt (17:33)
5. Silent Contemplation (15:46)
Part II: Invocation Of The Inner Flame
1. Gathering Of The Clansmen (26:45)
2. Wild Eyed Shamans (32:56)
3. Moonless Night (7:33)
4. The Coming Of Dawn (12:43)
The recording captures the entire performance, two hours of raw and ritualistic music in the vein of Mathias' recent output. Experienced listeners will recognize foundation material from the Wisdom of Fate and Dämmerung albums which has then been improvised upon. Carsten's percussion also stays with the entire performance and adds a new dimension to the music. Both discs end with new compositions which were improvised and recorded during the night shift at the local hotel." - GTERMA press release

Mathias Grassow.title: (2012) Bloodmoon
Mathias Grassow.about:
Composed and performed by Mathias Grassow in 2009-2010.
Mastered in September 2012 by A.P.
Compiled, edited and designed by mr_rehn.
Photography by mr_rehn.
Buy CD -->  gterma001to010.blogspot.se/p/gterma020-mathias-grassow-bloodmoon.html
If you want an autographed copy please contact Mathias Grassow here -->  www.mathias-grassow.de
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 4, 2012
"As the harvest season is over the cold and dark autumn is already creeping upon us. In October, the Hunter's Moon sits high atop the sky, bathing the landscape in its eerie bright light. The hunters would welcome this change which gives them a better chance of catching their next prey. Meanwhile, the people sit by candle light in their cottages on the edge of the forest, awaiting their soon return. Deep inside the woods, others bide their time.
Bloodmoon is a thematic album and was compiled from various projects recorded in the autumn and winter of 2009 and 2010. It ventures deep into the enigmatic Scandinavian woods in search of the mysterious and sometimes frightening creatures living there. Endless vistas of pine and evergreen cling to the old rocks and hills. Bloodmoon is a very strong and primal experience." - GTERMA press release

Mathias Grassow.about:

Mastered by A.P. in February 2012.

Buy CD -->  gterma001to010.blogspot.se/p/gterma008-mathias-grassow-dammerung.html
If you want an autographed copy please contact Mathias Grassow here -->  www.mathias-grassow.de
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released June 4, 2012
"The long and often dreary winters up here in the north are characterized by burning nightskies as the cold tears into the skin and the wind torments our eyes. Conversely the short summers with their bright colours and dreamlike nights have a very profound effect on the people and creatures dwelling underneath.
Sleeping by an open window the pleasant song of a mad happy Blackbird floats in on the breeze and blends with your dreams, while Swifts race through the moist evening skies and stray unemployed wasps feast upon sweet nectar in the mild August night. Dämmerung, a long flowing epos recorded in 2010, is our dedication to the Sun and her voyage across the burning evening skies of Northern Europe." - GTERMA press release

Mathias Grassow.title: (2012) Uttarakuru
Mathias Grassow.about:
Originally released in 1999 as two separate albums: THE EMPTY SKY and DISTANT LIGHT. If you missed those ones, now is your chance.
Buy CD -->  gterma001to010.blogspot.ru/p/gterma013-mathias-grassow-uttarakuru.html
If you want an autographed copy please contact Mathias Grassow here -->  www.mathias-grassow.de
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 13, 2016
Composed and performed by Mathias grassow in April 1999.
Remastered by A.P. in March 2012.
Design and photography by mr_rehn.
"Prepare for a bit of sound archaeology as we revisit two related drone pieces recorded back in April 1999. Together they illustrate a difficult voyage to the mystical northern continent of Uttarakuru, believed populated by a highly refined people with deep spiritual capabilities. They live secluded from our realm, beyond a massive and treacherous ocean, their homeland hidden among gloom mountains and unknown valleys. Governed by the ancient warrior king Kubera, legend has it that the capital Alakapuri is a city floating in the sky.
Tracklist
1. The Empty Sky (74:15)
2. Distant Light (74:41)
These two soundworlds were originally released in 1999 as parts of a loose longform dronescape trilogy, begun with "Hidden Deep", which was followed by "The Empty Sky" and "Distant Light" closing the suite. Originally available as no-name CDr:s they now appear on glassmastered discs for the first time." - GTERMA press release.

trackinfo.title: The Empty Sky
trackinfo.about: We had journeyed across a seemingly endless ocean, dark depths tearing wildly at our vessel. As we left our homeland, the divine heaven loomed above but no stars shone upon its face. Now we could finally see the stony shores of our destination ahead.
trackinfo.credits: from (2012) Uttarakuru, released December 13, 2016

Mathias Grassow.title: (2012) Wisdom Of Fate
Mathias Grassow.about:
Composed & performed in winter and spring of 2012 by Mathias Grassow
Mastered by A.P. in April 2012
Design & photography by mr_rehn
Thanks to Carsten Agthe
Buy CD -->  gterma001to010.blogspot.se/p/gterma016-mathias-grassow-wisdom-of.html
If you want an autographed copy please contact Mathias Grassow here -->  www.mathias-grassow.de
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released June 4, 2012
"Continuing on his musical wanderings as seen on "Alchemystery", Mathias once again travels down the obscured path of the shaman. Solemn soundscaping with heavy elements of percussion and flute selected from material recorded in winter and spring of 2012. The search for the legendary springs of Mímir and Urðr has begun.
Tracklist
Alchemy Suite Part III: The Spring of Mímir
1.1 - Out of Time and Mind (11:33)
1.2 - Across the Ífingr (8:47)
1.3 - Knowledge of the Hrímþursar (3:29)
1.4 - The Arcanum of Jötunheimr (17:42)
1.5 - Standing amidst Withering Rocks (11:39)
1.6 - Gazing Deep into a Void of Eons (17:31)
1.7 - Clarity of Mind (7:09)
Alchemy Suite Part IV: The Well of Urðr
2.1 - That Which Has Already Been (28:23)
2.2 - On Fragile Wings Once More Arisen (21:04)
2.3 - Twisted by the Hand of Fate (29:37)
According to the old norse mythos, the water from the spring of Mímir would bestow upon the person drinking from it, a deep wisdom and understanding. This immense promise of knowledge saw Odin, warlord of the Æsir, sacrificing one of his eyes to remain at the well in order to gaze into its revelations. Travel to the spring is hazardous, located underneath the roots of the world tree Yggdrasil, one has to venture into Niefelheim, home of the Hrímþursars, the frost giants. The Well of Urðr, on the other hand, can be found in the realm of the Æsir themselves, guarded by the three Norns Urðr, Verðandi and Skuld. They poured its waters on the roots of the Yggdrasil, while spinning the threads that would determine each and every person's fate." - GTERMA press release

Tracklist:

1.1 - Drifting Dawn (29:48)
1.2 - Endless (7:10)

2.4 - Midwinter Century (4:20)
The material used for Sonnenwende reaches back into the past five year period of Mathias' compositions and also includes even older material for the Summer Solstice suite. The double album comes in jewelcase with 16-page booklet." - GTERMA press release

Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 23, 2013
"Travels on dim ethereal oceans of mystery should be familiar waters to those of you who have been following gterma for some time now. On Tamanoshima, Mathias brings us into unchartered vistas for a slightly mindbending and hypnotic journey into minimal soundworlds. A warm and glowing drift based on material composed in the summer of 2013. Just like the music on the previous album Uttarakuru, Tamanoshima is a very minimal composition, much like endless waves crashing in on an long and empty waterfront, an imaginary ocean relentless and eternal." GTERMA press release

Mathias Grassow.title: (2015) Short Stories
Mathias Grassow.about: Originally released 16 Mar 2015 on German label Cosmic Winnetou as limited 100 hand-numbered audiocassetes only.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released June 27, 2015
Composed and performed by Mathias Grassow.
Artwork – Katya Velkova.
Releasing drone and ambient music since almost forty years, Mathias has developed his very distinctive style. Long lasting tracks which hum themselves into the listener's subconsciousness, mesmerising angelic overtones mixed with haunting deep drones to forget present space and time. For the cosmic winnetou release, his first one on cassette since the late nineties, Mathias encapsuled the essences of his musical magic into pieces with running time between two and fifteen minutes. Surprisingly those short tracks makes you even more forget where and who you are and transform your inner selve into some kind of zen saint mode. How he does this? Don't know, but make sure to regard the advice of the master himself:
"I’m sure you’ll find answers not in words, but in deep listening with your heart!"  cosmicwinnetou.blogspot.ru

Mathias Grassow.title: (2016) Closing The Eternity & Mathias Grassow
Mathias Grassow.about:
For limited K7 box-edition of 77 copies released by ΠΑΝΘΕΟΝ label you're welcome @  pantheophania.bandcamp.com/album/mathias-grassow-closing-the-eternity
In the deepness of the earth, among the mountain roots, between the sleeping ore deposits, colourful minerals and clear crystals slowly growing... There are empty corridors, dimly illuminated with green light; luxurious halls, decorated with rare gems and mineral patterns, strange stone trees, changing their colours... Who lives there, who owns these treasures of the deep? No one knows the entrance, but at the vernal equinox, in certain hour of night, it opens for a while. Mountain moans under huge starry sky, humming and roaring, startling sleeping birds in the nearby woods, making pine crowns bow to the wind. Ancient spirit emerges among the mossy rocks, crawling its way down, where the village dogs are looking anxiously at the forest edge. Filling with rustles of leaves and chimes of unseen bells, night disguises the mystery and no one knows what exactly happens at this time. Strange lights are wandering between the cliffs, green lizard eyes might sparkle in the dark... Only rays of morning reveal strange trail of gold pebbles and shining gems on the slopes, as if giant snake made a track by its stone scales, scattering the treasures of the underworld.
Inspired by the astonishing nature of Ural region and folk stories from "The Malachite Box" cycle by Pavel Bazhov (goo.gl/dqDhSG), this collaboration between German drone maestro Mathias Grassow and prominent Russian project Closing The Eternity reveals thoroughly crafted aural world, where deep chthonic drones interact with huge ambiences and multiple percussion sounds. Constantly breathing, organic, always changing and yet truly monolithic sound, which tells stories about hidden secrets of the earth.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2016) Dagaz
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album is dedicated to Nicolaus von Kues (1401-1464)
"Dagaz" is one of the most powerful runes in nordic Futhark and it stands for Awakening, Awareness and Transformation. Together with all cycles and oppositions of nature and mankind , "Dagaz" is the rune of light, which cannot be inverted. "Dagaz" is a protection rune and often was painted above doors and windows in the past. The positive affirmations of this rune are: success, spiritual growing, clarity and safety afar from any misunderstanding.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 28, 2016
Recorded in 2012
Remastered by 121 in 2016
Artwork by Cornelia Kern
ATTENTION: "Dagaz" defintely is the last AUTHORIZED release of el-culto Label, after the break of the artist with them.

Mastered in June 2016 by Anders Peterson.

Mathias Grassow.credits:
released July 22, 2016
"One of the strangest and most fascinating aspects of ambient music is the way it can sometimes morph from sonic wallpaper -where it basically functions as a soundtrack- into an agent of transformation, allowing the reshaping of the perceived world around the listener. Some of Mathias' albums have had this effect on me before, and the Darklight Quest definitely falls into this territory. gterma is happy to shine a light on this now mostly forgotten treasure.
The Darklight Quest is a longform drone ambient album with mystical properties. It was originally released as a DIY CDr in 1998. The album is closely related to the Nightquest and Dreamquest Sessions. This edition has been slightly edited and expanded with a prelude. It has also received a mastering touch by Anders Peterson of Ghost Sounds." - GTERMA press release

Electronics, electric guitar, sounds, effects, loops & rhythm programming by Mathias Grassow
"As cold and darkness once again descends upon Northern Europe we huddle within the walls of our confines, creep up to fireplaces and hide under thick blankets. Those who brave the foreboding climate and venture outside into the blackness find a nocturnal world under heavy clouds, or perhaps find themselves under the scrutinizing gaze of the coldest of piercing starlight. "The Nightquest Sessions", an enigmatic dream by itself, is a trusty partner under these circumstances. The creeping blackness that surrounded you a minute ago suddenly begins to give way and then invites you into an eerie beauty and sense of belonging.
The Nightquest Sessions was originally released as a DIY CDr in 1998 and follows a path similar to that of The Darklight Quest album." - GTERMA press release.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018-2020)  In the eyes of infinite light
Mathias Grassow.about:
This new collaboration with "Eyes cast down" (Greg Moorcroft) came about spontaneously and grew over a year. Some sounds are already known from various works by Grassow, but Greg has added a very own note to the pieces.....
Greg says :
"I asked Mathias in early 2018 if he had a track to which I might contribute. He sent me these four beautiful synth tracks.
Finding the right parts to complement them was a joy. The most inspired moment was spontaneously drumming on my Pork Pie drum throne (while sitting on it) listening to one of Mathias’ tracks. I ended up recording some of that for Epiphany with horses."
Above all, we hope you will find the music inspiring in many ways."
So, both artists ask you to feel the deep in 90 minutes profound ambient for a special price !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released January 29, 2020
Thanks to Greg Moorcroft for participation and the easy collaboration over so many miles.
Thanks too to my wife Cornelia Kern for layout & artwork.
Gregs notes: "Working with Mathias has been an honor and a lot of fun. Big thanks to him and Cornelia for their friendship and support."
Mathias Grassow plays several synths & samplers on this album. Furthermore, some various nature - and field recordings come from him.
Eyes cast down contributed to the following pieces with these instruments:
LUMINOUS: 12-string electric guitars.
GOLDEN PAVILLON: Electric & fretless electric guitars, E-Bow, frame drum, singing bowls, tingsha.
EPIPHANY WITH HORSES: Electric guitars, throne drumming, rainsticks, gravel, sticks, castanets, thunder tube.
ICESCAPE AT SUNRISE: Electric guitars, synth piano, processed tingsha.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018-2020) The salt of life
Mathias Grassow.about:
Salt is a symbol of health, vitality, success and happiness. It stands for consistency and incorruptibility. In the past, salt was weighed with gold and paid as a wage, and today you recognize a person's worth by giving them salt.....
"The salt of life" here stands for the essence of what we are here for; on the one hand individually, on the other hand in a spiritual context with the universe.
At the end of the resonance there is the great and unimaginable nothing, the sound of the inconceivable emptiness, which is at the same time permeated by abundance. Not comprehensible with the mind, but felt through this music - an idea ......
Pieces 1-3 are variations from "Europa - Part II".......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 6, 2020
Many thanks to Cornelia Kern for images and support - as ususal.......

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) Heart wisdom
Mathias Grassow.about:
This is a completely new album, based on basictracks from 2016 and 2017. Years ago I dreamed the sentence : "Heart wisdom is christ consciousness". Christ here stands for heart enlightenment, which is interdenominational.
This Album was made in two 'home-live-concert-sessions'. NO overdubs, afterwork, compression.....only with open mind and heart.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released March 16, 2018
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for support and cover painting.
This work is dedicated to some of my most loyal fans.....you know who you are.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) THE ARCANE STEPS OF EASTER CYCLE
Mathias Grassow.about: A brandnew realisation of parts from the big Tarot arcana. A journey through important life-steps and milestones in personal development. Inspired by the well known Rider/Waite Tarot.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released March 28, 2018
This is the second full album from AGUILAR . A very personal Tarot journey with well balanced male and femal share.
Main instruments are the human voice from both artists, specially in tracks 3 & 5, which were made ONLY with our layered voices and some cymbals.
The voices are NOT pitched, or otherwise processed or falsified.
NOTE : We worked here with a maximum of authenticity......the 'noise' in several parts of this album is owed to the enormous reverb we worked with and is a part of this musical journey.

trackinfo.title: The NARROW & the MAGICIAN
trackinfo.about:
Naivety, innocence, remorse, trust, security in the divine....
Activity, male energy, Intuition, alchemy, responsibility, self-realisation.
trackinfo.credits: from (2018) THE ARCANE STEPS OF EASTER CYCLE, released March 28, 2018

trackinfo.title: The TOWER
trackinfo.about: Fall from the high ross, karma, destiny, destruction, thrown back on himself, the Tower of babel.
trackinfo.credits: from (2018) THE ARCANE STEPS OF EASTER CYCLE, released March 28, 2018

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) The fall of the house of usher by GLEISBERG-GRASSOW-SEVIROLI
Mathias Grassow.about:
The long awaited successor of the legendary "House on the borderland" line up has finally become reality. It was a concern of all members to set this Edgar Allan Poe short story to music and the result is worthy of a successor to HOB.
We're proudly present this album here - ONLY available as download.
THIS ALBUM CONTAINS THREE HIDDEN BONUS TRACKS - ONLY AVAILABLE FOR THOSE WHO PURCHASE THE ALBUM !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 31, 2018
Mathias Grassow wants to thank ROGER CORMAN & VINCENT PRICE for the perfect conversion of this victorian horror Story.
Many thanks to Eduardo Pi Peret for leading us through the pyrenees, his stories, guides and, not to forget, for album layout and photographs !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) The final curtain......
Mathias Grassow.about:
Here comes the 1st mammoth release for upcoming autumn. All tracks are composed between 2010 and 2013.
The pieces are partly in similar form on other albums to find; but in this version exclusive and especially in this compilation of immense effect.
All tracks are played live in one take without any post-processing.....
so I apologize for small mistakes in the recordings.....
Over six hours of best dronning scapes !
ATTENTION : ALBUM CONTAINS A BONUS TRACK OF ONE HOUR LENGTH : "Mondseele" - Extended Version from the mid 90s with KW on singing bowls!
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 31, 2018
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for arising my flame over the years. Thanks to 121, Mr.Rehn , Andrey, Tim and Vitaly......and to KW for Inspiration of the track names ..... photography "Coast of river rhine near Bacharach" by the artist.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) The moment of creation
Mathias Grassow.about:
Brandnew creation from artists new studio near magical river rhine , very close to legendary EBERBACH monastery. Impressions from this world heritage with a lively history around castles, knights and wine. The "Silk road suite" leads to arabic traditions. Both "SUFI" tracks, holded back for years, fit perfectly into this mood and are a very personal insight in artists connection through mystical Islam. The "minimal missions" were lost and now found. These are now available for the first time.
Also these pieces were recorded without multitrack 'live' and not smoothed, or otherwise reworked. According to the title, my music always emerges live from the moment and is not repeatable..........
ATTENTION : This album contains two hidden bonus tracks; only available for those, who purchase the album.
May this music hold you close in dark november, before the winter comes......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 10, 2018
Thanks to my wife CORNELIA KERN for support, cover painting and my good spirit behind. All other companions through the years know who they are.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) "The seven continents" - Part 1: EUROPA ... through the times...
Mathias Grassow.about:
This is the beginning of something new, what started already with the CHULLACHAQUI album last week. EUROPE was chosen as the first from seven continents....the others will be published weekly.
The whole large-scale concept comprises 80 tracks in 7 (earth) parts, which should be heard individually, if possible without a break.... The very personal and inspired view from the artist is not clouded by title assignments so that each listener can follow his own associations.
In order to satisfy this concept, every continent can only be acquired as a 'complete album'.
NOTE: Anyone who buys all the continents will get an exclusive album just in time for christmas, which will not be available now or in the future !
JUST DROP ME A NOTE VIA BANDCAMP FORM WITH YOUR PRIVATE EMAIL. BONUS UPLOAD WILL FOLLOW IMMEDIATELY VIA WETRANSFER !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released November 5, 2018
Thanks as usual to my wife CORNELIA KERN for inspiration and photos.
This is an absolutely LIVE impression without any overdubs or overworking. This is not repeatable ! All that is to be heard here is part of the recording.......

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) Through catharian past - Remixes
Mathias Grassow.about:
These four pieces are a free interpretation of four of much more monumental "cathar castles" in southern france, which are up to 1200m high with a dramatic moving history.
Far from history lesson, only the breathtaking location in the Pyrenees is described musically.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 10, 2019
All four pieces are 2018 remixes from older tracks - mainly from the old "CD-R"-album "Through past in future" (1998).
New names and a contemporary mix resulted in a new concept.
So this album is not new and yet again experienceable.
Rhythm sources yet unknown after more than 20 years.............

trackinfo.title: Queribus
trackinfo.about: Is located at 728m altitude.
trackinfo.credits: from (2018) Through catharian past - Remixes, released August 10, 2019

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) Trinity - The lost of five
Mathias Grassow.artist: by AGUILAR (Mathias Grassow and Cornelia Kern project - founded in 2016)
Mathias Grassow.about:
Each track of this giant triple album was played through 13th and 15th february totally live in one take to a reference CD-Recorder in highest quality. NO overdubs, no compressing, no afterwork, refreshing or else.
That's not unprofessional, but method not to endanger the highest spiritual claim of this work.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released February 16, 2018
This is the first complete triple album made by both artists. The female voice and energy behind father and son. No more war and wrong honor....No father has to send his sons to war anymore. No mother have to cry any longer. This album is a legacy and a new beginning at the same time........
May we be forgiven. now is here...........

Mathias Grassow.title: (2019) An abandoned lost place.....
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album reflects the artist's impressions of one of the most mystical abandoned places in germany: The monastery "Marienberg" at river rhine near BOPPARD, not far from KOBLENZ.
The album was created as usual in a nocturnal passage, live, without computer, without multi-track method ...... to capture the ambience and the impressions perfectly........

The peculiarity is again that this album was recorded completely live in one go, to reflect a high degree of authenticity ..... feel the spirit where nature and mysticism meet .....

Mathias Grassow.title: (2019) The Gold of Caxamalca
Mathias Grassow.about:
"The gold of Caxamalca" is a six-part own interpretation of the eponymous story by Jakob Wassermann (1873-1934).
This book we read in german lessons in the eighth school class.
It moves me deeply until today. The musical realization does not condemn, it does not disdain prestige, it does not accuse. It serves the education and the understanding.
Music as a vehicle for education is an important stylistic device for understanding our ancestors - without false pride and prejudice. The colonial era has split our world until today, impoverishing whole continents. We are obliged to look and help.
Note to the conflagration on three continents:
This current bandcamp work "The Gold of Caxamalca" deals with the colonization of South America, the fatal consequences of which we are experiencing today and which we are powerless to face.
It's not about being furious with something that we were and are still the cause of.
South America, like Africa, is a continent that literally burns. According to the laws of cause and effect, all of this now comes back to us all and whoever looks will notice that.
There will be no solution, except that everyone strives, with silence in their hearts, to accept what is happening, WITHOUT waging war with all the faces they have revealed, all the grimaces that are only a mirror of our selves.
And here the poignant closing chapter, unfortunately temporarily only in german :
....."aber zur Einkehr und demütigen Betrachtung der menschlichen Dinge dauerte es noch lang. Was noch an Jammer und Niedersturz an meinem Auge vorübergezogen ist und an welchen unguten Taten ich fernerhin mit widerstrebendem Geist noch teilnahm, fühle ich mich zu berichten nicht versucht. Verfinstert sein und nach der Helligkeit lechzen, ist ein Zustand der Seele, der sie peinigt, aber auch zum Fließen bringt. Zwischen Ahnung und Wissen gibt es einen Weiser, zwischen Trägheit und Sehnsucht einen Ruf. Als ich einst über die Trümmer einer verkohlten Stadt wanderte und in die gebrochenen Augen von Menschenbrüdern blickte, befahl mir eine Stimme, zu schweigen und zu warten.Als ich ein andres Mal im Gebirge der Kordilleren auf eine Schar von sterbenden Kindern stieß, die der Hunger und die Angst aus den verödeten Dörfern hinaus in das wüste Pajonal getrieben hatte, weinte ich über das, was der Mensch ist und was er versäumt, zu sein.
Ich sah den Tod in jeglicher Gestalt, die er auf Erden annimmt; ich sah die Freunde hingehen und die Führer fallen und die Völker enden und die Unbeständigkeit jedes Glücks und den Betrug jeder Hoffnung und schmeckte den bittern Bodensatz in jedem Trunk und das heimliche Gift in jeder Speise und litt an der Zwietracht der Ge-meinden und an der Torheit selbst der Erleuchteten und an dem grausam gleichmütigen Rollen der Zeit über diese schmerzbeladene Erde und erkannte die Nichtigkeit alles Habens und die Ewigkeit alles Seins, und mich erfüllte das Verlangen nach einem besseren Stern, den die herrliche Sonne reiner durchglüht und edler beseelt hat. Dieser, auf dem ich lebe, ist vielleicht von Gott verstoßen."
FOR SOUNDSTREAMS PLEASE VISIT MY SOUNDCLOUD-STREAM - LINK BELOW !
soundcloud.com/mathias-grassow/alle-tracks-caxamalca-fur-soundcloud

Mathias Grassow.about:
The fascination of the highest elevations of this earth serves this first and at the same time extensive publication of the year 2019.
ALL fourteen 8000s find their space here !
Perfectly coherent with the 7 continents this work is also a purely intuitive and 100% live rehearsed emotional tribute to the mountains.
Composed and "home-live" performed & recorded during several days & nights between october 2018 & january 2019.
SPECIAL PRICE for over 6 hours very varied ambient from drone to tribal and chillout - inclusive 3 expanded and exclusive bonus-tracks, NOT outtakes.

In memory of many great and courageous mountaineers who died during the ascent or descent of one these mountains.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2019) The spaceless orbit of time
Mathias Grassow.about:
These four pieces are a tough chunk of minimalistic yet expanding depth and provocative space music ...... the feeling of being completely lost and being alienated reaches for us. Nevertheless, by being willing to take responsibility for ourselves, we can decide which way to choose. In the end, we have always been only in ourselves ......
Let the journey begin................
Track one was exclusively broadcasted in a shortener version by John Waveman under the working title "SPACEDRIFT" .....many thanks for promotion !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2019) The Tarart mima mystery
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album was made during the night of 27th october in one take.....a live improvisation, a 'home'-concert. No overdubs no afterwork or else. Just pure music 'by accident'. Specially the 4th and 5th ones are in minimal style with hidden movements and nested rhythms, patterns....and more.....; Anyway: Most of all motions takes place in the mind of the listener, or not ?
The title has no special meaning......or maybe yes ?
ALBUM CONTAINS A HIDDEN BONUS TRACK OF 46 min. length !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2019) THE WORLD WARS I & II - A symphony of steel
Mathias Grassow.about:
The topic of this new album has long been close to my heart.
Both world wars significantly changed the world and still influence our daily lives today.
After long deliberation, I decide to use only years as a godparent for the events as a name, free of any prefabricated opinion and direction.
Again, there is no accusation, no conviction and no influence, but everyone has the freedom to find themselves, their parents, or grandparents in the years.
No matter from which side one looks at these two wars, terrible atrocities would be committed everywhere.
With this work I want to use the music as a non-verbal means of communication. I would like to transform bewilderment and dismay into inner peace and silence in the heart and wish that this has been achieved.
Right now we are in such dire need of looking closely at what is happening politically with humans and the environment worldwide.
This work, which I call my most important work, stands for forgiveness and love. It is dedicated to all the dead and suffering. It affects us all - everyone and everywhere.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released September 4, 2019
This project is by no means finished with the musical representation, but should live, remind, admonish and enlighten. ..... 80 years ago World War II broke out and now the world is burning again .....
I wish a lot of feedback on this work.
Anyone who has touching pictures from this period and would like to be part of this project, feel free to contact me here.....
Maybe there will be a kind of "CD-book", a lyrical work with pictures, texts and of course CD's ... - maybe......no promises......
Cover photos by Cornelia Kern and the artist; editing by Cornelia Kern.
Thanks to Marco Kern (MK-Allround-Service) for mental support in so many directions - you are the future !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2020) Bazaar
Mathias Grassow.about:
Here now a simple (?) story ...... the eternal story of man and women, then, now, forever, analogue and digital. Getting to know each other as an opportunity, as a temptation as a means to an end, as medicine, as a poison, as a cure.
It has never been so easy to get to know, connect, judge and humiliate people. It has never been so easy to find and recognize yourself, to hurt and persecute, to follow, to surrender and to love across all borders. It's all about love - that's what we're here for ..... this is an invitation to contact and to experience joy and trust when awakening.......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released June 5, 2020
Many thanks to my wife and eternal companion Cornelia Kern for inspiration, concept and artwork.
This is also the story of me and my wife, to whom I gave this music for her birthday.......
Many thanks to all my loyal and patient friends all over the world - you know who you are......

Mathias Grassow.title: (2020) Eleven virtues
Mathias Grassow.about:
"Eleven virtues" is an idea, a collection of primarily knightly virtues from the late Middle Ages, which I intuitively assigned to these pieces. I chose these virtues because I liked them best; Especially in comparison with the cardinal virtues, the Prussian virtues etc.
Of course, opinions on the "most important" and contemporary virtues diverge. Accordingly, of course, every listener has their own scope to discover this for themselves here as well.
The order of the individual pieces and their titles is not to be understood as an increase in the virtues to be acquired, but rather intuitive and arbitrary. The recordings were made "live at home" in a continuous session.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 4, 2020
Many thanks as usual to my beloved wife and "Aguilar" mate Cornelia Kern for cover layout and support.
Cover photo taken by Tara Bierwisch.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2020) АЭС EmergencyStopExplosion
Mathias Grassow.about:
This topic is moving. Move us, move everyone. It is past, present and future at the same time. Forever. It will never stop. Every human comprehensible dimension is exceeded here.....
An intangible dimension shows us its claw in apparent peace. The fire that does not burn will follow us for centuries, the path we have prepared for it.
It is not Satan, it is not God, it was not and is not made for us. It follows us, it is invisible. Death from nothing, in wonderful blue, literally redeems us through dissolution, through extinction.
Now everyone knows what this is about. The synonym does not make it necessary to pronounce the invisible horror.....
The Australian bushfires are an extension of this, an outcry that we apparently understand better and yet have not understood......
Here now "A 3-5" ..... again no charges, no explanations, no searching for guilty parties, because we are all the same here. This work stands for bewilderment, for the intangible outside, which is only a mirror of our souls.
I also dedicate this work to the many nameless people who, through their selfless efforts, prevented far worse things.
Without these people I might not be able to sit here today and write that......
May it do justice to the situation..........
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released January 12, 2020
I also have to finalize this - already created in November 2019 - work now, as long as the fire of authenticity burns in me - it is far more than just a musical project - it gives me peace in the sense of being a tool :-)
May it do justice to the situation..........
Many thanks to Cornelia Kern for cover-artwork, layout and all the usual things a good album needs to be published......

Mathias Grassow.title: (2020) KaleidosHope
Mathias Grassow.about:
This new 80 minute album was created around the same time as "Bazaar" and can therefore be seen as a follow-up album and yet......it is different : Middle points here are also oriental instrumentation, whereby the hypnotic 5th piece represents the core of the mysticism of the Arab worlds and bridges this with the west and the typical "drone" music.
"Life is a kaleidoscope and we design its blaze of colors..."
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 7, 2020
Thanks to CORNELIA KERN for images, titles and cover-concept.
NOTE : Parts V & VI were played live during my forthcoming live album from "Gut Saunstorf" nearby Wismar in germany on 1st of august 2020.
I want to dedicate this album In memory of the "Hibakusha" - and all the victims of the atomic bombs dropped on Hiroshima and Nagasaki on August 6th and 9th, 1945.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2020) Live at Gut Saunstorf 1st of august 2020
Mathias Grassow.about:
This is the original recording of the concert at Gut Saunstorf near Wismar on August 1st, 2020. The recording was not post-processed, but rather adopted due to the preservation of the highest possible authenticity with all background noises and errors in order to faithfully reproduce the great spirit of this event.
NOTE:
Tracks 1-7 were recorded directly in the audience with a TASCAM live recorder.
Tracks 8 & 9 are the same concert in only two parts - but here taken from the hall mixer.
So everyone has the opportunity to choose their personal version ......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 2, 2020
Thanks to the whole team and organisators of the concert, you know who you are ! Thanks for the great support to my wife Cornelia Kern.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2020) Too much distance
Mathias Grassow.about:
This is the story of our constant drama of seeking closeness while rejecting those who really give us closeness, because we don't let ourselves be touched ...... fear becomes anger, struggle, suffering.
This music does not offer a solution, it is just another vehicle whose direction we determine: fear or love?
It may be a little confusing that my new work deals with proximity, although the opposite is recommended due to "Corona".
I mean cohesion and real solidarity here. It's just about ...... it's always about love.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released March 8, 2020
Thanks to my wife Cornelia Kern for mental support, images and words.....

In the deep sense of unity with all beings, emptiness is fullness and fear is a thing of the past.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2020) Yggdrasils burning
Mathias Grassow.about:
This more classic drone-album was created from 3 home sessions that year, from which this two hour selection was made. The current critical situation of our "green lungs" and the consequences of what has not wanted to be seen for decades is the concept of this work. The titles refer to the eight largest "primeval forests" on our planet.
Title explanation:
Yggdrasil, Old Norse Yggdrasill, also: world ash, is the name of an ash tree in Norse mythology that embodies the entire cosmos as a world tree.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 24, 2020
Many thanks as usual to my wife Cornelia Kern for Images and support.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) Cascading Rosespirals
Mathias Grassow.about:
Now finally the continuation of the "Mystical rose project" in a special extended version......
"The flower of flowers as calyx and conception at the same time. The holy grail as the idea of ​​the womb and at the same time the source of life ......"
Inspired by the outstanding fan responses to the first album.
This series will continue with continued success - work is already underway on successors......
It is planned to release the complete "Rose Series" as CD's in a limited box. Negotiations are underway with a well-known label.....
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released March 5, 2021
Thanks to my wife Cornelia Kern for the idea, concept and cover design of this second part.
Dedicated to all women who have lost contact with themselves through patriarchy and are suppressed.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) Missa Universalis
Mathias Grassow.about: This "Mass" has less of a classical ecclesiastical meaning than a kind of "reverent" inner view of what is what we are and what is reflected in and through us and resonates with us. Like outside, so inside, like inside, so outside. We are the world...

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) Mysterium cosmographicum
Mathias Grassow.about: Just as the idea of a harmony of spheres has been anchored in mankind for thousands of years, so a connection between geometry and the heavenly conditions has probably been suspected for just as long. Plato associated the five existing and named after him regular bodies with the elements fire, water, earth, air and heavenly etheric substance. He assigned the latter to the dodeceder, the figure bordered by twelve pentagons. The adjacent twelve-surface is inscribed with its insphere, which touches the centers of all side surfaces. The sphere indicated by the outer circle touches all 20 corners of this Platonic body.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released July 16, 2021
Thanks to my wife Cornelia Kern for support, cover image and layout

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) The incomprehensible emptiness
Mathias Grassow.about: What is emptiness, what is nothing? Again the question of the "correct" direction in life is asked. What's the point, what's wrong, what's right? Are concepts such as infinity, emptiness, nothing, time and transience relative, or fixed values ​​that we do not grasp, but merely interpret and put into formulas in order to understand a world that has long eluded our perception?
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 4, 2021
Many thanks to my personal inspiration and muse nature, my family and friends .... you know who you are......
Thanls to my wife Cornelia Kern for cover image and layout.
"Stop praying.
What I want you to do is go out into the world and enjoy your life. I want you to sing, have fun and enjoy everything I've made for you.
Stop going into those dark, cold temples that you built yourself and saying they are my house. My house is in the mountains, in the woods, rivers, lakes, beaches. That's where I live and there I express my love for you.
Stop blaming me for your miserable life; I never told you there was anything wrong with you or that you were a sinner, or that your sexuality was a bad thing. Sex is a gift I have given you and with which you can express your love, your ecstasy, your joy. So don't blame me for everything they made you believe.
Stop reading alleged sacred scriptures that have nothing to do with me. If you can't read me in a sunrise, in a landscape, in the look of your friends, in your son's eyes... ➤ you will find me in no book!
Stop asking me "will you tell me how to do my job?" Stop being so scared of me. I do not judge you or criticize you, nor get angry, or bothered. I am pure love.
Stop asking for forgiveness, there's nothing to forgive. If I made you... I filled you with passions, limitations, pleasures, feelings, needs, inconsistencies... free will. How can I blame you if you respond to something I put in you? How can I punish you for being the way you are, if I'm the one who made you? Do you think I could create a place to burn all my children who behave badly for the rest of eternity? What kind of god would do that?
Respect your peers and don't do what you don't want for yourself. All I ask is that you pay attention in your life, that alertness is your guide.
My beloved, this life is not a test, not a step on the way, not a rehearsal, nor a prelude to paradise. This life is the only thing here and now and it is all you need.
I have set you absolutely free, no prizes or punishments, no sins or virtues, no one carries a marker, no one keeps a record.
You are absolutely free to create in your life. Heaven or hell.
➤ I can't tell you if there's anything after this life but I can give you a tip. Live as if there is not. As if this is your only chance to enjoy, to love, to exist.
So, if there's nothing after, then you will have enjoyed the opportunity I gave you. And if there is, rest assured that I won't ask if you behaved right or wrong, I'll ask. Did you like it? Did you have fun? What did you enjoy the most? What did you learn?...
Stop believing in me; believing is assuming, guessing, imagining. I don't want you to believe in me, I want you to believe in you. I want you to feel me in you when you kiss your beloved, when you tuck in your little girl, when you caress your dog, when you bathe in the sea.
Stop praising me, what kind of egomaniac God do you think I am?
I'm bored being praised. I'm tired of being thanked. Feeling grateful? Prove it by taking care of yourself, your health, your relationships, the world. Express your joy! That's the way to praise me.
Stop complicating things and repeating as a parakeet what you've been taught about me.
What do you need more miracles for? So many explanations?
The only thing for sure is that you are here, that you are alive, that this world is full of wonders."
- Spinoza

Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) The shamans of science : Al-Shaman Chapter I - Scripts and secrets
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album is the first in a trilogy dealing with alchemy and shamanism. The possible connection is only intuitively recorded musically and should give the listener space to find his own interpretation, or to experience something completely different.
Part 1 "Al-Shaman - Chapter I : Scripts and secrets" lists the old, well-known scripts - valuable documents that never reveal the whole secret.
Instruments : Several synths, frame & shaman drums, Djembe, deep voice, field recordings.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released February 4, 2021
Thanks as ususal to my wife Cornelia Kern for cover paintings and layout.
