Mathias Grassow.title: (2021) Trans-Orient-Express
Mathias Grassow.about: An eurasian and mystical journey. A train ride in the style of the Orient-Express..... but imaginary maybe from Spain to Persia, or from whereever. you may start..... Impressions from the train window........ Emotions, memories of heydays, of becoming and passing away, of universal and own truths and lies, of progress and regression, - of senseless loops and finally coming home..... or the return ? .......... Impressions from the train window....... Emotions, memories.........repeat...... Transmission ends......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released June 18, 2021
Totally played LIVE in one take at home between 5th and 7th april 2021. No overdubbing !
--> The last three "hidden" pieces represent alternative ends of the journey.
A small wink....... as return from the journey every listener can consider his personal preferred "station". <--
Played in respect and deep gratitude on several synths and samplers, several ritual-shaman-frame drums & over/undertone singing.
Mastered by Thomas Sauer alias SONIC☉SPACES  (pen-umbra.bandcamp.com)  - many thanks !
Thanks for my second life gift and to all who accompanied me......
Love you CoKe ;-)

Mathias Grassow.title: (2022) Codex alimentarius
Mathias Grassow.about:
The "Codex alimentarius" is a commission led by the WHO and the lobby of elite (food) corporations, which practically determines what humans are allowed to eat and what not. Under the flag of "consumer protection", it is still forbidden to declare food as a remedy under threat of high fines.
In other words, foods have no healing effect, otherwise they would be medicines. For this reason, the qualities of food and the education of what is really good for us are ignored from conventional medicine. Instead, genetically modified foods are propagated in order to increase profits and keep people in disease and thus dependent.
This work acts now to a very current topic and musically approaches the long-forgotten wisdom about our nutrition.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 10, 2022
After "Carmina hildegardis" now - after more than 30 years - my second work, which I would like to dedicate to the great HILDEGARD VON BINGEN.
Cover image (harvested rapeseed field) and layout by my wife CORNELIA KERN, many thanks !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2022) Halla
Mathias Grassow.about:
.... and here a brand new and exclusive work with HEIKKI LINDGREN, which gave us a special pleasure. Finnish folklore instruments combined with ambient textures and drones.
Mathias Grassow : Ambient drones & textures.
Heikki Lindgren : Bowed lyre (Finnish jouhikko), overtone flutes D and F, wooden horn (Finnish lulletti).
Jouhikko (bowed lyre), overtone flute and lulletti (wooden horn) are some of the instruments from Finnish archaic tradition. In this album they are used in modern context, but still in the same long sound aesthetics as they were played centuries ago in Finnish Karelia.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 2, 2022
Many thanks to the inspiring soundworks and field recordings of Heikki Lindgren :
heikkilindgren.bandcamp.com
This album is the beginning of something new and experimental. To be continued.....

Video: Jukka Andersson

Mathias Grassow.title: (2022) Interstellar ambience
Mathias Grassow.about:
This four-hour epic brings together the stories and tales of the two albums AMBIENCE and INTERSTELLAR GRAVITY into a coherent work and is at the same time a continuation of both albums. AMBIENCE once stood for the mysticism of the earth (-> here especially the Nordic hemispheres), INTERSTELLAR GRAVITY the feelings in orbit, the universe and in all the vastness known to us. Here, heaven and earth unite into a network far beyond the known...... which, understandably, we mostly encounter with fear. Is there life besides us? Is there life among us? Are we and our ideas (!) real at all? Are we in a matrix, in a hologram? What is finite, what is not? Where is the beginning, where is the end?
In view of these questions, this work may seem small, inconsequential and dubious.... may it nevertheless accompany everyone's own insights and hopes and lift up the listener...... in spheres where no human being has ever been before...
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 3, 2022
Many thanks as usual to my wife Cornelia Kern for cover image and layout.
Celebrated on several electronic and acoustic equipment.
In memoriam of Klaus Schulze (1947-2022).

Mathias Grassow.title: (2022) Liana of spirits - Rank of souls
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album is dedicated to the importance of ethnological-transpersonal experience with reference to the intake of Ayahuasca, which has a special cultural status especially in South America and is used on all continents in different contexts.
Ayahuasca is here the synonym for the very own forces of nature, going back to DMT, which can be found in all life forms.
The current world political conditions require inner contemplation and knowledge of any kind. May the listener learn through the music alone which way is the most suitable......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released February 4, 2022
This musical realization is not based on a recommendation to take Ayahuasca and the music was not composed and recorded under Ayahuasca.
Many thanks to Cornelia Kern for cover image and support :-)

Mathias Grassow.title: (2022) The SEER
Mathias Grassow.about:
Here is the new and long-awaited second work on the renowned swedish GTERMA label in accustomed quality : THE SEER is about the famous american medium EDGAR CAYCE(1877-1945), who in so-called "readings" made contact with other worlds in a kind of trance and seemed both prophetic and was able to make contact with the "hereafter".
He was particularly stressed by many desperate parents & partners, who especially after the 1st World War sought help from him because of the loss of their beloved......
EDGAR CAYCE was called "the sleeping prophet" because he gave his "readings" lying down and with his eyes closed.
Particularly noteworthy for us artists is his statement that "music would be the medicine of the future".
Like all media, Edgar Cayce was not entirely without controversy, but such a discussion should not be the subject of the album dedicated to him here. For more information, please use the Internet.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 7, 2022
Album mastered by A.P. in july 2022. Design and artwork by mr_rehn.

Whether turbo-capitalism, exploitation of all kinds, climate change, war and epidemics... All this seems irreversible by now and thus it is a very "thoughtful" album on the precipice of decision - our decision..."

Mathias Grassow.about:
We are proud of our first joint work "Gazing into transience". - originated from 3 sessions in winter/spring 2023.
This one here is a first Part of these extended sessions - more will follow at irregular intervals
Marcel Trettin is a gifted guitarist with classical training, who comes more from the metal field (Bands DEADWOOD & APSIS) and brings his profound knowledge to life here.
Initially more ambient, both artists will also be willing to create more experimental works in the future; maybe there will even be a real "band"; even a "metal-heavy" sound is discussed. It remains exciting and you will hear more from us !

It's not just about looking at the stars, but also about listening to the noise, similar to the white noise on our planet.
But enough of the "instructions": ...... If you have ears, then LISTEN ...... This work is also a philosophical approach to the infinity of the universe.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2023) Heartbeat of the earth
Mathias Grassow.about:
The energetic effects of the increasing solar storms encounter a currently unstable geomagnetic field and manifest themselves, among other things, in the "red auroras" that could also be seen far below the Arctic Circle in Central Europe......This could be another sign of an imminent pole shift.
The red auroras and light columns generally indicate strong anomalies in the atmosphere.
The effects of this cannot yet be estimated and need not cause fear - but they are a cause for concern and should continue to be observed and scientifically analysed.
This album is a musical approach to this topic.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 1, 2023
Many thanks to Cornelia Kern for cover image, layout & support.
Thanks to Marcel Trettin for processed electric guitar participation in some tracks.
Soon another full-time-album of both artists will be published.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2023) Siddhartha
Mathias Grassow.about:
This album is dedicated to the buddhist four noble truths and the noble eightfold path to self-knowledge and ending suffering on earth. An exciting psychologically sophisticated vehicle for achieving inner peace.
Buddhism serves here as a template for a "non-theistic" model of depth psychology that has proven itself over many centuries.
The fixation and throwing back on one's own effort in the direction of "becoming-the-you-are" goes beyond mere beliefs, reflects and accompanies the seeker from darkness and blackness (->NEGRA) into the light of being..........
For more detailed information on the buddhist teachings of the four noble truths that form the backbone of Buddhism, as well as information about the eightfold path, we ask you to consult the Internet.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 5, 2023
This modest musical adaptation of buddhist teachings is only a non-binding excerpt here and matured over years. So SIDDHARTHA is a tribute to this path, as well as to the wonderful book of the great HERMANN HESSE.
Cover image and layout by CORNELIA KERN, many thanks !
Like NEGRA, this album was realized mainly on SOMA devices. The "drifting memory station" COSMOS & LYRA-8 were used significantly.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2023) White Noise Shaman - I : The Dark Side of Untersberg
Mathias Grassow.about:
MATHIAS GRASSOW & HEAVENLY HERMIT proudly present :
Here we are following a long-cherished wish to set the magical Untersberg to music, which has a dark and a light side. We start here with one of a few dark sides and internalize the white noise of the mountain streams first of all .....
With relatively spontaneous support from the very talented
HEAVENLY HERMIT, a sound work worthy of the mountain spirit was created here.
This album does not want to entertain, nor to ensnare and please. It was born out of a deep feeling for the Untersberg, the most magical mountain in Europe with its many legends and stories.
The journey continues .....
One basis here in the first part is white noise from SOMA QUANTUM OCEAN, garnished with deep throat singing, shaman instruments and various synths and electronic equipment - basically a 140 minute journey in one long piece, divided into 13 parts.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 6, 2023
Thanks to nature, which practically reproduces all frequency spectra with the sound of water. Here as a "canned" with the same effect - headphones recommended !
Please don't listen while driving !
Thanks to Evgeny Vladimirovich for his participation on this album.
Thanks to Marcel Trettin for mastering this album.
Thanks to Cornelia Kern for cover image and layout.
My very special thanks go to Mr. RAINER LIMPÖCK, the founder of the Alpine Shamanic Network, for his suggestions, guided tours and his deep knowledge of the mountain and the many stories around this place of power :
www.alpenschamanismus.de

Mathias Grassow.title: (2024) A whole Life - The Beauty of Simplicity
Mathias Grassow.about:
‘A whole life - the beauty of simplicity’..... Here again, a “simple” concept is followed......, that of the simple and frugal life, which does not look back in resentment, but looks at the NOW and the “future” with fear and concern, knowing that it can be actively shaped. Frugal does not mean conforming or following false compromises, but resting in oneself, accepting everything that may come and facing it with the elemental force of one's own speciality and uniqueness and acting with wisdom and kindness.
Created in a difficult phase of life, recorded on the afternoon of one's own life in autumn; doubting many things that happen, saying goodbye to friends and colleagues who had to or were allowed to leave earlier, this work in 9 parts (+ 2 bonustracks !) is intended to encourage us to approach life in peace so that we can cross over one day without struggle.
And here's something down-to-earth for the synth freaks: Created as always LIVE on: SOMA ‘Terra’, DREADBOX ‘Nymphes’, BEHRINGER ‘Pro-800’, BEHRINGER ‘Solina String ensemble’, BEHRINGER 'Crave', WALDORF ‘Streichfett’ and some other tools and cable clutter ;-). Garnished with SOMA ‘Cosmos’ etc. blablabla......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released December 6, 2024
Many thanks to MARCEL TRETTIN for the guest contribution on distorted electric guitar on ‘From the centre of life’.
Thanks also to the fans and supporters of my music, for whom all the ‘drones’ and philosophical drivel ;-) have not yet become too much.
‘Here I am and I can't help it’.
Ambient is musical philosophy for us, an orientation towards the ‘zeitgeist’ from the eagle's perspective........
Idea, concept and title based on inspirations from the book & film ‘A Whole Life’ by director Hans Steinbichler, based on the novel of the same name by Robert Seethaler.- many thanks.
Cover image and layout by Cornelia Kern, many thanks !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2024) HARMAJA
Mathias Grassow.about:
The weather conditions along the Finnish coast are observed at 38 coastal weather stations, making marine weather reports an integral part of navigation in the region and throughout the Baltic Sea. Harmaja island, situated off the coast of Helsinki, where a lighthouse has stood since the 18th century, now also houses a coastal weather station. The album 'Harmaja' draws its inspiration from the Baltic Sea, much like its predecessor, 'Shallow Waters'.
Just as coastal weather stations sit at the edge of land and sea, capturing the nuances of ever-changing weather patterns, picking up the subtle shifts in temperature, wind, and humidity, the music of this album acts as a sonic observer. Perched on the borderlands between music and atmosphere, it tunes into the subtle fluctuations of sound, weaving together ethereal textures and sonic landscapes that rise, drift and evolve, mirroring the rhythmic flow of the tides.
Heikki Lindgren: bowed lyre, overtone flutes
Mathias Grassow: 4 x Roland SP808-Ex, Behringer Crave, Ashun Hydrasynth, Roland Gaia, Clavia Nord Stage II Ex, Waldorf Streichfett, Dreadbox Nymphes, 2 x Alesis Quadraverb, Soma Cosmos, Behringer Edison, Ultrafex, Denoiser……
No Software was used in this recording. All instruments were played live with some resampling of the finish traditional instruments.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 29, 2024
Mathias Grassow:
"Many thanks to HEIKKI LINDGREN for his collaboration in this project.
Many thanks to my wife Cornelia Kern for mental support and patience over so many years. And of course a big hug to all Cyclical dreams members"
All music composed, arranged, performed and produced by Mathias Grassow & Heikki Lindgren.
Mastered by Cyclical Dreams
Artwork: Cyclical Dreams
Photography: Amp Puttipong
NOTE :
For legal reasons all releases of the artist on CYCLICAL DREAMS will be published on this site about half a year later !

Mathias Grassow.title: (2024) Life is all you Need
Mathias Grassow.about:
‘Life is all you need’ can be seen as the direct successor to “Now is all you have”. It is even quieter, even more modest, even more contemplative; coming along quietly and taking the listener into its own depths.
Loosely based on the ‘Truman Show’, ‘Life is all you need’ reminds us of our limited time here on earth in which we can decide which reality we choose; almost anyone and at almost any time.
This album was recorded live and directly on several days in October, practically as good as improvised - one of the artist's trademarks. Perhaps the last album of the year, it is once again intended to symbolise peace and light in the world.....It's up to us.....each and every one of us.....
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released October 31, 2024
For the hardware freaks ;-) :
This album was mainly recorded with 3 synthesizers : SOMA ‘Terra’, ASHUN ‘Hydrasynth’ and WALDORF ‘Streichfett’.
No computer Hard - and Software was used in these recordings.
Many thanks again to the SOMA team for the ingenious development of the ‘Terra’, which was developed for this kind of music.
M.G. would like to dedicate this album to the British band IQ, who have touched him deeply with their last 3 albums and, despite the difference in style, have contributed significantly to the creation of this album.....
Cover image and layout by the artist.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2024) Now is all you have.....
Mathias Grassow.about:
The message of peace that our world so urgently needs is a warm and light-filled channel for the energies needed to see through the destructive spectacle and counter it with energy from the heart. "Now is all you have...." is by no means a "new age" or "cosmopolitan" album, but it is deeply spiritual..........
It is divided into two parts. The first part, about 75 minutes long, is a homage and reminiscence of the "Fragrance of eternal roses" album, which was mainly produced in the 90s and is one of MG's "deepest" albums.
The second part is an outcry for peace in the world and is directed at the powerful of this world to stop the senseless warmongering, to negotiate and to realise that we are all ONE and only have this ONE earth. Just in time for MG's birthday on 9 May - not for nothing the end of the Second World War - we remind here and still not often enough that war never led to peace, let alone preserved it. Music unites and we are pleased to be able to contribute to this with this album.
MG - 05/03/2024
"The end of the Second World War is commemorated in Ukraine on 8 May. Until now, 9 May has remained the day of victory over National Socialism in the Second World War, on which the victims are commemorated and which is no longer called the "Great Patriotic War"."
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 3, 2024
Thanks to all the inspiration for the title and music of this album.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2024) The Ambience of Silence - Live from Gut Saunstorf 08-01-2024
Mathias Grassow.about:
Capturing a moment of silence......
Listening with the "third ear"......
The LIVE event from "Gut Saunstorf" near Wismar in Mecklenburg-Vorpommern was the prelude from 01. of august to a long night concert (02. & 03. august) and is presented here in the best quality from the hall mixer.
The applause took place in silence; the energy could be felt beyond the sounds......
Due to its length, the approximately 110-minute concert was split into two parts and only slightly edited to ensure authenticity.
You can hear tracks from the albums: TRAUMWERK, THROUGH AN UNKNOWN STARGATE, INTERSTELLAR AMBIENCE and SIDDHARTHA - (not in this order).
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released August 9, 2024
Audio recording from 01. of august 2024.
Thanks to the entire technical team and the loving care on and around Saunstorf Monastery - you know who you are..... ;-)

Mathias Grassow.title: (2025) Dissolution II - The end of all knowledge
Mathias Grassow.about:
This one is a dark one.
This one is DISSOLUTION II.
We don't like declaration as "death ambient", but maybe it's a groundbreaking one.
Important note and because of current occasions :
Should ‘ambient music’ be political in the broadest sense? Should it take a stand or be a counterpoint to the alarming development in the entire northern hemisphere? Is the world tree already burning and what can we contribute to the general pacification of the situation ? Our music is to be seen as a spiritual mirror and, as it were, as a non-verbal statement on unconditional peace - but not as an unconditional surrender to humaneness. These thoughts have been preoccupying us for several years now and lie like a veil over our creativity. Looking away no longer helps here, but ‘looking within’ and transforming the war within us does.....
‘Dissolution II’ is another tireless call to relentless introspection and to pacify the spirits and traumas within us, without taking a stance on the outside and polarising.
In line with the comment above, ‘The great journey’ is once again the main theme of “Dissolution II”, which is on most people's minds. 25 years after the first part, here is the second ‘updated’ part, which follows the depth of ‘Dissolution I’ and even goes beyond it. A film based on all fears and doubts, because life always ends fatally. This basically worries everyone, because nobody knows when, where and if judgement will be passed on us.
Peace and respect for life should be the endeavour of us all, because at the beginning and end of life we are all the same.......
Due to its intensity, we recommend listening to this work not necessarily in one go, but rather in 2-3 sessions.
Winter goes and spring comes - so please expect brighter sounds again soon.........
‘Between foreboding and knowledge there is a sage; between inertia and longing there is a call’
(J. Wassermann)
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released March 7, 2025
Many thanks to Cornelia Kern for cover image and layout.
The processed singing bowl recordings are played live by the artist during several decades.

Mathias Grassow.title: (2025) LAOCOÖN
Mathias Grassow.artist: LAOCOÖN by L.John-Krol, M.Grassow, D.Schlömer + guests R.Gleisberg, C.Agthe, M.Krol.
Mathias Grassow.about:
LAOCOÖN is a joint album by the aforementioned artists.
LAOCOÖN alludes to Graeco-Roman epic poetry. On another level, it explores themes of intimacy, identity and integration.
In the ancient myth, Apollo’s priest Laocoön incurs Athena’s wrath, by warning the Trojans. So Athena sends pythons (snakes) onto Laocoön and his sons. In our album art we set their statues with Asian imperial dragons, expressing Australia’s place in Asia, where serpents usually signify life and luck.
On the CD disc is the Norse ouroboros: a serpent eating its own tail, symbolising transmigration and renewal.
The basic idea stems from the friendship between Mathias Grassow and Louisa John-Krol, which was initiated by their mutual friend Carsten Agthe through his many contacts and his commitment.
Louisa’s co-songwriter Mark Krol was already a Mathias Grassow fan. Louisa & Dirk were label mates on Hyperium before joining other labels.
Created over 20 years ago, then refined by Dirk Schlömer (ex-Ton, Steine, Scherben, Stella Maris, Das Zeichen and now ORNAH-MENTAL), Rüdiger Gleisberg and Carsten Agthe (Nostalgia, KarmaCosmic) as guests, this work is now available in its final mix and combines various styles into a sophisticated and even danceable album. We are all proud of the result of a not so easy birth.......
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 27, 2025
Many thanks to everyone involved here and in and from ‘down under’. Worldwide musical co-operation across all borders cannot be valued highly enough in these difficult times. Thanks to all the good spirits behind this album.......
This album touches... Let's allow it, let's change the world. Thank you !
Vocals by Louisa recorded by Brett Taylor.
Album front cover art: ‘Coastline on Yawuru country’ by pilot-photographer Andy Kube.
Thanks both of them and to many others who helped the album to be born and released with their spirit and encouragement!

trackinfo.title: Fires of June
trackinfo.lyrics: ‘Fires Of June’ When will you come, will loving come home soon? what will we do – how will we sign this room? under the eyes of older gods  who play with pentacles of time, when all our birds under the stone  are shadows in the sky! When will I fly – when will I run to you? what will you do – if I arrive in blue? and if we fly, and if we fall,  and if I stumble in my tune, will he who waits alone be mine  and keep alive the fires of June? I will come home soon
trackinfo.artist: LAOCOÖN by L.John-Krol, M.Grassow, D.Schlömer + guests R.Gleisberg, C.Agthe, M.Krol.
trackinfo.about:
Laocoön - notes per song, by Louisa John-Krol.
Fires Of June
Flight, reverie, arrival, whimsy, caprice: as we are from northern and southern hemispheres, it is ambiguous whether we conjure winter hearths or summer wildfires. A mystery, too, whether the one ‘who waits alone’ is abroad, or at home awaiting reunion.
trackinfo.credits: from (2025) LAOCOÖN, released May 27, 2025

trackinfo.lyrics: ‘Winter Sun’ The Moon hides rays from the Winter Sun Faint tears bemoan skies of rain – Step here to the home of the Winter Sun Sham fear removes the stain of pain The turning opens:  return the key! The masks of angels demand a fee In here there’s a room for the Winter Sun Faint tears bemoan skies of rain – Step here to the home of the Winter Sun Sham fear removes the stain of pain The journey’s over:  your candle’s burned! We’re waiting for you behind the Moon

Winter Sun
Assorted goths, mods, new wavers, psychedelic rockers, hipsters, carnies, punks, pre-Raphaelites, witches, sonic alchemists and other indies are heading downstairs into a subterranean chamber. It could be a liminal realm, like Dante’s Limbo; or Hades’ underworld, where Orpheus seeks Eurydice who has died of snakebite; or the Elysium Fields, Welsh Annwfyn, Irish Mag Mell, Norse Niflheim, or the Sufis’ Alam Mithal, just to name a few.

trackinfo.title: A Thousand Questions
trackinfo.lyrics: ‘A Thousand Questions’ One fine morning when the snails were squealing  through my window pane, you fell in your astro suit  crashing through the ceiling  with your digit pointing at me: So we’re gonna play a thousand questions smash the reel, zoom the cat and zap! Why did you fly to the moon? Why did you try to bend my tune? Why did I let my mother eat the jam? Why did I let my cat sing bam bam? So we’re gonna play … Why did you want to squeeze my name? Why did I drive your car into a lake? So we’re gonna play … Why did you wind your clock into tomorrow? Why did you shake the snake and bake? Why did you let the egg swing and borrow? Why did you take the drake and quake? So we’re gonna play … Why did the gravity eat the rainbow? Why did your eyes turn pink? Why did I ask for your opinion? Why won’t you let me think? So we’re gonna play … Why is the sky a blue medallion? Why is that coin so blue? Why does it show a thousand faces? Why does it smile like you?
trackinfo.artist: LAOCOÖN by L.John-Krol, M.Grassow, D.Schlömer + guests R.Gleisberg, C.Agthe, M.Krol.
trackinfo.about:
Lyrics & melody by Mark Krol. Guest guitar by Nicholas Albanis.
Laocoön - notes per song, by Louisa John-Krol.
A Thousand Questions
An alien - or a lover? - of amorphous origin, gender, orientation, age or creed, crashes through a ceiling, digit pointing, ready to ask: Why?
trackinfo.credits: from (2025) LAOCOÖN, released May 27, 2025

trackinfo.title: Laocoön
trackinfo.lyrics: ‘Laocoön’ Are you inside me?  Or am I inside you? Laocoön, Laocoön Wrap yourself around me!  Be yourself inside me Is it my self waking in you? Contemplating love  – Terrifying love! Is this me thinking or is it you, you? Swimming with the River Sinking in my armour Do I embrace this change or do I falter? Laocoön my python,  When will you let me go? How do I find a way through this tangle? Are you inside me?  Or am I inside you? Is it me thinking of you? But wait, you are me! Hey, wait, I am through wrestling with you, Being you, Laocoön
trackinfo.artist: LAOCOÖN by L.John-Krol, M.Grassow, D.Schlömer + guests R.Gleisberg, C.Agthe, M.Krol.
trackinfo.about:
Laocoön - notes per song, by Louisa John-Krol.
Laocoön
Come then, integration! What is this transformation? Is it alchemy, transmigration, mutation or another mystery? Perhaps, like peace, it means different things to us all?
trackinfo.credits: from (2025) LAOCOÖN, released May 27, 2025

Mathias Grassow.title: (2025) Retreat into the Perseverance of Inner Light
Mathias Grassow.about:
Retreat into the perseverance of inner light.......:
An important album for the spring and the unfortunate ‘turn of an era’ as far as people and nature and our use of resources are concerned. In general, without making a political statement, there is nevertheless an uncompromising call for peace in the world hidden in the sound and, as it were, to switch off all the dark media that divide us, incite us and ultimately manipulate us deeply. This music supports the retreat into the OWN LIGHT and HARMFULNESS in dark times......
‘The light has sunk into the earth, the image of the darkening of the light......
Thus the superior man lives with the great multitude, he veils his light and yet remains bright.....’
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released May 2, 2025
This album is another new collaboration between Mathias Grassow, Heikki Lindgren and Honza Benes on tracks 1-5 & 7. Track 6 is a solo project by MG and found its place here - embedded in the little play on words ‘Aus gegebenem Anlass’ (-> ON/OM this occasion) - as an expression of the world situation in the sense and wisdom of the I-GING.
This global political situation is more than worrying and our music should be nothing more and nothing less than a call for inner peace, so that this can also manifest itself on the outside.....
Many thanks as always to CORNELIA KERN for the title and the lyrics for tracks 2-4, as well as for the congenial cover design of ‘Patience’, which is what matters now when we send our inner light into the world.
MATHIAS GRASSOW (DE) :
All electronics, handplayed frame drum on track 7, Sequential Circuits Prophet T-8 synthesizer on track 6, album concept.
HEIKKI LINDGREN (FIN) : Bowed Lyra, effects.
METAVOICE (CZ) : Processed E-Guitars, synths, effects.

trackinfo.title: Ouverture
trackinfo.credits: from (2025) Retreat into the Perseverance of Inner Light, released May 2, 2025

trackinfo.title: Flowing Construction
trackinfo.about:
Flowing Construction..........
The first gentle sounds reach your consciousness through a delicate channel. They guide you softly, supporting your perception. Thoughts may drift away—you are free to let go. The sounds flow intensely, unstoppably. Small waves emerge.
The stream grows wider, deeper—it merges with a new sound. This element grants you focus and clarity. You are carried, guided. The current aligns your thoughts, opening a space of lucidity. Everything becomes clearer. Facets, details, and accents take shape, forming a new construction within you.
Breathe in, breathe out—in your own rhythm. The sounds sort your thoughts, sweeping away obstacles and blockages. Feelings and thoughts synchronize. Then comes the decision: Will you bring this construction into the world, or will you let it go? The goal of your sound journey is reached. All emotions connected to it dissolve. Peace.
trackinfo.credits: from (2025) Retreat into the Perseverance of Inner Light, released May 2, 2025

trackinfo.title: Sunrise
trackinfo.about:
Sunrise..........
A new day begins—a day of birth. With this energy, you take your place in the world. Gentle, determined, unstoppable. Here you are. Your stories are infinite, transforming everything. Because everything is interconnected. Your flow, your transformation, your evolution—they are endless. You feel infinity.
Blockages are only emotions waiting for release. But you were born to feel. Your essence is meant for feeling. This is you. Remember your loved ones.
trackinfo.credits: from (2025) Retreat into the Perseverance of Inner Light, released May 2, 2025

trackinfo.title: Opening the Channel
trackinfo.about:
Opening the Channel..........
A deep humming vibration pierces your consciousness. It creates an opening, clearing the path for holistic perception. You enter a space of transcendence. What is possible? What is true? Why do you feel different?
You become more transparent. The sounds connect your innermost self with the outer world. Nonduality. More and more, you become the sound itself, like a wave carried into the ocean—until you are the wave, until you are the ocean. Your inner self opens, you see and feel yourself. No judgment, only pure existence.
This intense soundscape is your home. The sounds surround you and fill you from within. Thoughts vanish, the sensation grows stronger. You are alive. The truth takes its place. You receive.
trackinfo.credits: from (2025) Retreat into the Perseverance of Inner Light, released May 2, 2025

trackinfo.title: I-GING 36 - Ming-I "The darkening of light"
trackinfo.lyrics: NO SUNG LYRICS, but...... This piece represents the ‘Yamantaka’ energy of Tibetan Buddhism. If you are interested, please look up the energy of this ‘entity’ on the internet.......
trackinfo.about: ‘In the end, however, the darkness perishes of itself, for evil must fall at the moment that it has completely overcome the good and thus consumed the power to which it owed its existence so far......’
trackinfo.credits:
from (2025) Retreat into the Perseverance of Inner Light, released May 2, 2025
Celebrated mainly on the legendary SEQUENTIAL CIRCUITS T-8 Synthesizer.
Highly recommended to listen with headphones !

Mathias Grassow.title: STEP I - The early years (1980-1983) - "The gardens of imagination"
Mathias Grassow.about:
This new and carefully compiled series begins with two compilations from the early days and the beginning of M.Grassow's career. If there is enough interest, we will be happy to continue using this portal for more fine releases from our archive.......at irregular intervals.
So here is number one from "The early years" - 1980 - 1983
After 40 years of musical travel, this is the real beginning from the beginning .....
Enjoy !
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released September 3, 2020
Many thanks to my Russian friends and especially to LEV LEVIN for all their efforts to select and provide the most representative pieces from the times. AGUILAR only has the rights to offer and distribute this music here.
Special thanks to CORNELIA KERN for page design, images and words and all her work through the times :-)

Mathias Grassow.title: (2018) Thelderbin (track from "Elderbrook"-album)
Mathias Grassow.about: "Thelderbin" is a track with MGs participation on LOUISA-JOHN KROL Album "ELDERBROOK" - a brandnew masterpiece from this outstanding australian artist.
Mathias Grassow.credits:
released January 7, 2018
Many thanks to Louisa for approval to upload our track on my bandcamp page and for long lasting friendship !
Cover-artwork by Cornelia Kern & Mathias Grassow.
